text: ChuckleVision is a British television series created by Martin Hughes and the Chuckle Brothers for the BBC. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1980s British television series Category:1990s British television series Category:2000s British television series Category:1980s children's television series Category:1990s children's television series Category:2000s children's television series Category:1987 television series debuts Category:2009 British television series endings Category:BBC Television programmes Category:Television series about brothers
